verses.verse: It <S%H4428>happened,<s%> when the king <S%H3427>lived<s%> in his <S%H1004>house,<s%> and <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> had given him <S%H5117>rest<s%> from all his <S%H341>enemies<s%> all <S%H5439>around,<s%>

that the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H5416>Nathan<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet,<s%> <S%H7200>"See<s%> <S%H3427>now,<s%> I dwell in a <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H730>cedar,<s%> but the <S%H727>ark<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H3427>dwells<s%> <S%H8432>within<s%> <S%H3407>curtains.<s%>"
<S%H5416>Nathan<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H4428>king,<s%> <S%H3212>"Go,<s%> <S%H6213>do<s%> all that is in your <S%H3824>heart;<s%> for Yahweh is with <S%H3068>you.<s%>"
It happened the same <S%H3915>night,<s%> that the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> came to <S%H5416>Nathan,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H3212>"Go<s%> and <S%H559>tell<s%> my <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H1732>David,<s%> <S%H559><s%> 'Thus says <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> "Shall you <S%H1129>build<s%> me a <S%H1004>house<s%> for me to dwell <S%H3427>in?<s%>

For I have not <S%H3427>lived<s%> in a <S%H1004>house<s%> since the <S%H3117>day<s%> that I brought <S%H5927>up<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> out of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> even to this <S%H3117>day,<s%> but have <S%H1980>moved<s%> around in a <S%H168>tent<s%> and in a <S%H4908>tabernacle.<s%>

In all places in which I have <S%H1980>walked<s%> with all the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> did I <S%H1696>say<s%> a <S%H1697>word<s%> to <S%H259>any<s%> of the <S%H7626>tribes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> whom I <S%H6680>commanded<s%> to be <S%H7462>shepherd<s%> of my <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H1129><s%> 'Why have you not built me a <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H730>cedar?<s%>'"'

Now therefore you shall <S%H559>tell<s%> my <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H559>this,<s%> 'Thus says <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies,<s%> "I <S%H3947>took<s%> you from the <S%H6629>sheep<s%> <S%H310>pen,<s%> from following the <S%H6629>sheep,<s%> that you should be <S%H5057>prince<s%> over my <S%H5971>people,<s%> over <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

I have been with you wherever you <S%H1980>went,<s%> and have cut <S%H3772>off<s%> all your <S%H341>enemies<s%> from before <S%H6440>you.<s%> I will <S%H6213>make<s%> you a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H8034>name,<s%> like the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H1419>great<s%> ones who are in the <S%H776>earth.<s%>

I will <S%H7760>appoint<s%> a <S%H4725>place<s%> for my <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and will <S%H5193>plant<s%> <S%H7931>them,<s%> that they may dwell in their own <S%H7264>place,<s%> and be moved no <S%H1121>more;<s%> neither shall the children of <S%H5766>wickedness<s%> <S%H6031>afflict<s%> them any <S%H3254>more,<s%> as at the <S%H7223>first,<s%>

and as from the <S%H3117>day<s%> that I <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H8199>judges<s%> to be over my <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel.<s%> I will cause you to <S%H5117>rest<s%> from all your <S%H341>enemies.<s%> Moreover <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H5046>tells<s%> you that Yahweh will <S%H6213>make<s%> you a <S%H1004>house.<s%>

When your <S%H3117>days<s%> are <S%H4390>fulfilled,<s%> and you shall <S%H7901>sleep<s%> with your <S%H1>fathers,<s%> I will set <S%H6965>up<s%> your <S%H2233>seed<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H3318>you,<s%> who shall proceed out of your <S%H4578>bowels,<s%> and I will <S%H3559>establish<s%> his <S%H4467>kingdom.<s%>
He shall <S%H1129>build<s%> a <S%H1004>house<s%> for my <S%H8034>name,<s%> and I will <S%H3559>establish<s%> the <S%H3678>throne<s%> of his <S%H4467%H99999>kingdom<s%> <S%H5769>forever.<s%>

I will be his <S%H1>father,<s%> and he shall be my <S%H1121>son.<s%> If he commits <S%H5753>iniquity,<s%> I will <S%H3198>chasten<s%> him with the <S%H7626>rod<s%> of <S%H582>men,<s%> and with the <S%H5061>stripes<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H120>men;<s%>
but my loving <S%H2617>kindness<s%> shall not depart <S%H5493>from<s%> <S%H5493>him,<s%> as I took it from <S%H7586>Saul,<s%> whom I put <S%H5493>away<s%> before <S%H6440>you.<s%>

Your <S%H1004>house<s%> and your <S%H4467>kingdom<s%> shall be <S%H539>made<s%> <S%H5704>sure<s%> <S%H5769>forever<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3678>you.<s%> Your throne shall be <S%H3559%H99999>established<s%> <S%H5769>forever.<s%>"'"
According to all these <S%H1697>words,<s%> and according to all this <S%H2384>vision,<s%> so <S%H5416>Nathan<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H1732>David.<s%>

Then <S%H1732>David<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H935>went<s%> <S%H3427>in,<s%> and sat <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh;<s%> and he <S%H559>said,<s%> "Who am <S%H136>I,<s%> Lord <S%H3069>Yahweh,<s%> and what is my <S%H1004>house,<s%> that you have <S%H935>brought<s%> me thus <S%H1988>far?<s%>

This was yet a small <S%H6994>thing<s%> in your <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Yahweh;<s%> but you have <S%H1696>spoken<s%> also of your <S%H5650>servant<s%>'s <S%H1004>house<s%> for a great while to <S%H7350>come;<s%> and this after the <S%H8452>way<s%> of <S%H120>men,<s%> <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Yahweh!<s%>
What <S%H3254>more<s%> <S%H3254>can<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H1696>say<s%> to <S%H3045>you?<s%> For you know your <S%H5650>servant,<s%> <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Yahweh.<s%>
For your <S%H1697>word<s%>'s <S%H3820>sake,<s%> and according to your own heart, you have <S%H6213>worked<s%> all this <S%H1420>greatness,<s%> to make your <S%H5650>servant<s%> know <S%H3045>it.<s%>

Therefore you are <S%H1431>great,<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H430>God.<s%> For there is none like <S%H430>you,<s%> neither is there any God <S%H2108>besides<s%> <S%H8085>you,<s%> according to all that we have heard with our <S%H241>ears.<s%>

What <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H1471>nation<s%> in the <S%H776>earth<s%> is like your <S%H5971>people,<s%> even like <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> whom <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> to <S%H6299>redeem<s%> to himself for a <S%H5971>people,<s%> and to <S%H7760>make<s%> himself a <S%H8034>name,<s%> and to <S%H6213>do<s%> great <S%H1420>things<s%> for <S%H3372>you,<s%> and awesome things for your <S%H776>land,<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> your <S%H5971>people,<s%> whom you <S%H6299>redeem<s%> to yourself out of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> from the <S%H1471>nations<s%> and their <S%H430>gods?<s%>

You <S%H3559>established<s%> for yourself your <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> to be a <S%H5971>people<s%> to <S%H5704>you<s%> <S%H5769>forever;<s%> and <S%H3068>you,<s%> Yahweh, <S%H1961>became<s%> their <S%H430>God.<s%>

<S%H3068>Now,<s%> Yahweh <S%H430>God,<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> that you have <S%H1696>spoken<s%> concerning your <S%H5650>servant,<s%> and concerning his <S%H1004>house,<s%> <S%H6965>confirm<s%> <S%H5704>it<s%> <S%H5769>forever,<s%> and <S%H6213>do<s%> as you have <S%H1696>spoken.<s%>

Let your <S%H8034>name<s%> be <S%H1431%H99999>magnified<s%> <S%H5769>forever,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H3068><s%> 'Yahweh of <S%H6635>Armies<s%> is <S%H430>God<s%> over <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> and the <S%H1004>house<s%> of your <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> shall be <S%H3559>established<s%> before <S%H6440>you.<s%>'

For <S%H3068>you,<s%> Yahweh of <S%H6635>Armies,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> have <S%H1540>revealed<s%> to your <S%H5650>servant,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H1129><s%> 'I will build you a <S%H1004>house.<s%>' Therefore your <S%H5650>servant<s%> has <S%H4672>found<s%> in his <S%H3820>heart<s%> to <S%H6419>pray<s%> this prayer to <S%H8605>you.<s%>

<S%H136>"Now,<s%> O Lord <S%H3069>Yahweh,<s%> you are <S%H430>God,<s%> and your <S%H1697>words<s%> are <S%H571>truth,<s%> and you have <S%H1696>promised<s%> this <S%H2896>good<s%> thing to your <S%H5650>servant.<s%>

Now therefore let it <S%H2974>please<s%> you to <S%H1288>bless<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of your <S%H5650>servant,<s%> that it may continue <S%H5769>forever<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H136>you;<s%> for you, Lord <S%H3069>Yahweh,<s%> have <S%H1696>spoken<s%> <S%H1004>it.<s%> Let the house of your <S%H5650>servant<s%> be <S%H1288>blessed<s%> <S%H5769>forever<s%> with your <S%H1293>blessing.<s%>"
